textItems.text: While in college I lived in a different location every summer. I wanted some way to commemorate my travels and memories but as a student I couldnt afford souveniers from the places in  which I was visiting and working.

So I started collecting shot glasses! If you are a world traveler this is a great collectible. They are almost everywhere you go and they will be the cheapest thing in the gift shop. In my search for these glasses, I have gone into many shops that I would not have otherwise in search of a unique glass for the journey.
Each glass is not only unique in its own artistic right, but they also hold memories of all the places I have seen and cultures I have experienced. I hope you enjoy!
